author: cnbc.com
title: Tanger Outlets Announces Executive Promotions
text:
GREENSBORO, N.C., Tanger Factory Outlet Centers, Inc. (NYSE: SKT), announced today that Lisa Morrison has been promoted to Executive Vice President, and Chief Financial Officer James F. Williams has been promoted to an Executive Vice President, effective immediately.
As the Executive Vice President, Leasing, Ms. Morrison will continue to lead leasing strategy across the Tanger portfolio. Ms. Morrison has been with the Company for over 20 years in various roles with increasing responsibility in the leasing department.
As the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Mr. Williams will continue to be responsible for the Company's financial reporting processes, as well as supervisory responsibility over the senior officers who lead the Company's accounting, finance, investor relations and information systems functions. Mr. Williams is approaching 25 years with the Company in various roles with increasing responsibility in the finance department.
About Tanger Factory Outlet Centers, Inc.
Tanger Factory Outlet Centers, Inc., is a publicly-traded REIT headquartered in Greensboro, North Carolina that presently operates and owns, or has an ownership interest in, a portfolio of 44 upscale outlet shopping centers. Tanger's operating properties are located in 22 states coast to coast and in Canada, totaling approximately 15.3 million square feet, leased to over 3,100 stores which are operated by more than 500 different brand name companies. The Company has more than 37 years of experience in the outlet industry. Tanger Outlet Centers continue to attract more than 189 million shoppers annually. For more information on Tanger Outlet Centers, call 1-800-4TANGER or visit the Company's website at www.tangeroutlets.com .
